refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Puts the user into an editor to edit a file that has been filled with the ident, air code, material code, LOS, and name of all the regions in the specified objects. The user may then modify the entries (except for the names). The editor used is whatever the user has set in the environment variable EDITOR. If EDITOR is not set, then /bin/ed is used.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the edcodes command for editing the region codes in the files of two objects.

example.title: Edit the region codes of two objects.

listitem.para: Enables the user to edit the region codes for all regions below object1 and object2.
